title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Friday, October 6 (game #620)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: The RAINBOW 2 Pro controller: Elite performance without breaking the bank
description: The Rainbow 2 Pro from BigBig Won finds the happy place where gaming aesthetics and robust features come together. With stunning RGB lighting paired with a translucent body, the Rainbow 2 Pro controller offers Hall effect triggers, protection from stick drift, and remappable buttons, so you can get the upper hand no matter what game you enjoy.

title: Meet Japan’s weirdest laptop — Panasonic’s extraordinary 1kg Let’s Note takes two SIMs, has a round touchpad, and holds on to a 35-year-old tech so that you can run four monitors
description: Panasonic’s latest Let’s Note also features a detachable battery pack with a 16-hour lifespan.

title: Adobe's new photo editor looks even more powerful than Google's Magic Editor
description: Adobe shows off Project Stardust, which can remove objects in images and replace them with AI content.

title: Can AI help Arc browser take on Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge?
description: The Browser Company's Arc browser, debuting on Windows very soon, offers an AI-driven, customizable web experience, enhancing productivity and user convenience.

title: Fitbit's new AI chatbot will tell you exactly why you workout felt like a slog
description: Fitbit has previewed a new AI chatbot that will help you drill down into your workouts to find out what went wrong (or right).

title: Horizon Forbidden West: Complete Edition will be the first two-disc PS5 game
description: Horizon Forbidden West: Complete Edition will take up two whole discs for the PS5.

title: Sigma’s affordable wide-angle lens for Sony and Fujifilm fans is the smallest of its kind
description: The Sigma 10-18mm f/2.8 DC DN is the smallest and lightest f/2.8 zoom lens for APS-C cameras.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 is getting ranked multiplayer in season one
description: Sledgehammer Games has announced that Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 will get ranked multiplayer in Season one.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 will have new perks and 'remix' some fan favourites
description: Call of Duty: Call of Duty 3's loadout selection has been updated, including new perks.

title: Microsoft confirms Azure attacks using breached SQL servers
description: A novel approach to targeting Azure VMs, but still a valid threat.

title: Sony confirms data breach impacting thousands of workers
description: Breach, which had been announced on the dark web, saw crooks claiming to have hacked "all" of Sony's systems.

title: Cyberpunk 2077 has sold 25million copies, is "selling far faster" than The Witcher 3 did
description: CD Projekt Red has revealed that Cyberpunk 2077 has sold 25million copies since its 2020 launch, as Phantom Liberty officially clears three million in its first week.

title: Silent Hill: Ascension may premiere on the scariest night of the year
description: A Google Play listing has suggested that Silent Hill: Ascension will premiere soon.

title: Thousands of industrial systems, including power grids and traffic lights, found exposed online
description: If it's on the public net, it can be targeted and abused in different ways.

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty patch 2.01 is out now and improves performance on all platforms
description: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty patch 2.01 has officially rolled out for PC and current-gen consoles.

title: Docker wants all devs to be able to build their own containers
description: Three new tools designed to speed up developer workflows have just landed on Docker’s platforms.

title: Finally, Porsche has cracked the Apple CarPlay experience – here's why
description: My Porsche App now allows owners to control vehicle functionality, without leaving the Apple CarPlay ecosystem

title: Kawasaki launches its first electric Ninja in the US – and it's the cheapest one so far
description: Kawasaki releases its first electric Ninja motorbike, but it's aimed squarely at the novice rider.

title: Okta and Yubico team up to offer easy passwordless authentication for your firm
description: Yubico has launched pre-registered security keys, making it easy for Okta users to authenticate their passwordless logins.

title: The Volcon Grunt Evo is the off-road electric motorcycle Mad Max dreams are made of
description: The Volcon Grunt Evo goes into production and promises silent, off-road thrills

title: Intel’s long-lost Arc A580 suddenly appears online – is the GPU about to launch?
description: Alchemist GPU thought to be MIA looks like it’s about to arrive, and could be an entry-level winner.

title: 13 unionized Dragon Age: Dreadwolf QA testers have been laid off
description: Every unionized Dragon Age: Dreadwolf QA tester has been laid off.

title: Built-in Devialet Dione speakers are coming to Japan Airlines seats – if you can afford it
description: Devialet and Safran's 2022 partnership Euphony airline seat is finally coming to a seat near you – if you fly business class.

title: Malicious Python packages found stealing data - here's how to stay safe
description: Be careful which Python packages you're downloading - some are carrying a malicious infostealer.

title: Exclusive Gran Turismo movie behind the scenes clip shows how its high-octane races were made
description: Gran Turismo's races were too quick for normal cameras – so Sony used a fleet of the world's best drones instead.

title: Move over Fujifilm, the new Leica Sofort 2 could be the ultimate Instax instant camera
description: Leica’s second-generation Sofort 2 is a modern hybrid instant camera in the mold of the retro Fujifilm Instax Mini Evo.

title: Animal Crossing is one step closer to reality thanks to this new Lego set

title: Android 14 has a host of tools designed for your business - here's the best we've seen
description: Managed device admins now have greater control of security with Android 14.

title: Sorry, Netflix: the people have spoken and they love Max more
description: Who's the best streaming service? A new study suggests that when it comes to streaming satisfaction, Max leads by a mile.

title: Missing Bridgerton? Apple TV Plus’ new show looks like a great satirical replacement
description: Edith Wharton's final, unfinished novel is in good hands for this fun and funny Apple TV Plus adaptation.

title: The Samsung Galaxy SmartTag2 is here, but where is Google's true AirTags rival?

title: BlackBerry splits into two companies, focusing on cybersecurity and IoT
description: BlackBerry will make its IoT and cybersecurity businesses separate entities as early as 2024.

description: Hitman: Blood Money Reprisal is coming to Nintendo Switch, iOS, and Android later this year.

title: Apple rolls out iOS 17 update to fix iPhone 15 Pro overheating and says it won't impact performance
description: Apple has patched an iOS 17 bug that's causing iPhone 15 Pros to overheat, and it claims performance won't be affected.

title: Windows 11 remains an unloved OS – but why won't people upgrade?
description: It looks like Microsoft has a serious problem with convincing people to upgrade from Windows 10.

description: Popular password manager Dashlane has announced that it will support passkeys on Android 14.

title: Want to snoop on your remote workers? Good news, it's perfectly legal - but your employees won’t like you

description: Diablo 4 is getting a Steam release to coincide with the game's second season of post-launch content.

description: Red Dead Redemption's PS4 remaster just got an update, meaning it can now run at 60fps on PS5.

title: Amazon and Microsoft facing antitrust probe over cloud computing dominance

title: Bing Chat can now create more realistic images thanks to DALL-E 3 AI upgrade
description: In addition to producing better content, Bing Chat's image generator has new features to maintain ethical integrity.

title: $2000 RTX 4090 external watercooled GPU dock has finally been tested  — an 850W desktop video card that can run on almost any laptop with a Thunderbolt 3 port is what creatives should aspire to
description: The GPU box can link up to four displays at any one time and output at 8K resolution.
